meanings.definition: Soft and comfortable like a cushion.
meanings.sent1: The puppy curled up on the cushiony bed for a nap.
meanings.sent2: She sank into the cushiony armchair after a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: The cloud looked so cushiony, I wanted to jump on it!
meanings.sent4: The snow was so cushiony under my feet, like walking on clouds.
meanings.sent5: The cushiony blanket wrapped around her like a warm hug.

meanings.definition: Providing a soft and comfortable surface.
meanings.sent1: The cushiony mattress made her feel like she was sleeping on a cloud.
meanings.sent2: The cushiony grass in the park was perfect for a picnic.
meanings.sent3: The cushiony rug felt like walking on a fluffy marshmallow.
meanings.sent4: The cushiony sofa welcomed her with open arms after a tiring day.
meanings.sent5: The cushiony pillow cradled her head as she drifted off to sleep.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a cushion.
meanings.sent1: Her cheeks were so cushiony, like two soft pillows.
meanings.sent2: The clouds in the sky looked cushiony and inviting.
meanings.sent3: The cushiony clouds seemed to be playing a game of hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The cushiony marshmallows in the hot chocolate melted in her mouth.
meanings.sent5: The cushiony petals of the flower felt like delicate silk to the touch.
